attributes.action: Current House of Lords - Total Con
attributes.additional_details:
The House of Lords is a total con - I have been against a non-elected (by the public) House of Lords for years.
We need a proper Public Elected House - not one as  defined by previous and current processes - (just what are they? - jobs for the boys? - exactly)!! - And just exactly what are Lords? - There is only just One!!
All members of a Second House to be elected by the public!!!
